org.drip.xva.universe

Class EntityNumeraireVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.xva.universe.EntityNumeraireVertex

  • public class EntityNumeraireVertex
extends java.lang.Object
    EntityNumeraireVertex holds the Vertex Market Numeraire Realizations at a Trajectory Vertex of the given Entity (i.e., Bank/Counter Party). The References are: - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2013): Funding Strategies, Funding Costs, Risk, 24 (12) 82-87. - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2014): PDE Representations of Derivatives with Bilateral Counter-party Risk and Funding Costs, Journal of Credit Risk, 7 (3) 1-19. - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2014): In the Balance, Risk, 24 (11) 72-75. - Gregory, J. (2009): Being Two-faced over Counter-party Credit Risk, Risk 20 (2) 86-90. - Piterbarg, V. (2010): Funding Beyond Discounting: Collateral Agreements and Derivatives Pricing, Risk 21 (2) 97-102.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
